makerbit.isSensorTouched: Returns true if a specific touch sensor is currently touched. False otherwise.
makerbit.isSensorTouched|param|sensor: the touch sensor to be checked, eg: TouchSensor.T5
makerbit.isTouched: Returns true if a specific touch sensor is currently touched. False otherwise.
makerbit.isTouched|param|sensorIndex: the touch sensor index to be checked, eg: 5
makerbit.onTouch: Do something when a touch sensor is touched or released.
makerbit.onTouch|param|handler: body code to run when event is raised
makerbit.onTouch|param|sensor: the touch sensor to be checked, eg: TouchSensor.T5
makerbit.touchSensor:
Returns the sensor index of the last touch event that was received.
It could be either a sensor touched or released event.
This block is intended to be used inside of touch event handlers.
makerbit.touchSensorIndex: Turns a TouchSensor into its index value.
